```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# load packages
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# load data
dataJoe <- readxl::read_xlsx("DataJohan.xlsx")
dataDre <- readxl::read_xlsx("DataAndreas.xlsx")

# add id
dataJoe <- dataJoe %>% 
  mutate(id = 1)

# add id
dataDre <- dataDre %>% 
  mutate(id = 2)

# merge
skidata <- rbind(dataJoe, dataDre)

# rename stuff 
skidata$`Trip Planner Level of Caution (done at home)` <- skidata$`Trip Planner Level of Caution (done at home)`

```
